mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_enroll ( open_id, member_id, enrolled_at, status ) SELECT #{openId}, #{memberId}, now(), #{status} FROM class_open o JOIN class c ON c.class_id = o.master_id WHERE c.class_id = #{classId} AND o.open_id = #{openId}
mapper.select: SELECT enroll_id, open_id, member_id, status, enrolled_at FROM class_enroll WHERE enroll_id = #{enrollId}
SELECT enroll_id, open_id, member_id, status, enrolled_at FROM class_enroll ORDER BY enrolled_at DESC
